titleStmt.title: A copy of His Maiestys most gracious letter to the Lord Major and aldermen of his city of London, and all other his wel-affected subjects of that city.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).
Violet, Thomas, fl. 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford in the 19. yeare of our raign, 26. Decem. 1643."
Copy at reel 29:2[379] contain ms. letter on verso, dated '17 Aug.'
Imperfect: copy at reel C25:2[24] includes only 'A copy of His Maiestys most gracious letter ...'
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
